title: The Intelligent Investor
author: Benjamin Graham
notes: Foundational principles on margin of safety and investor behavior.

title: A Random Walk Down Wall Street
author: Burton Malkiel
notes: Great intuition-builder for market efficiency and indexing.

title: The Cross-Section of Expected Stock Returns
author: Fama & French
notes: Classic factor paper underpinning size and value premiums.

title: Momentum
author: Jegadeesh & Titman
notes: Canonical evidence for momentum in stock returns.

title: Designing Data-Intensive Applications
author: Martin Kleppmann
notes: CS-side: clean mental models for data systems and tradeoffs.

title: Quality Minus Junk
